featured.text: The Canadian government made gold seekers bring one year’s supplies with them so that _______.
In 1932, the United States and Canadian governments renamed the parks the Waterton-Glacier International Peace Park, the world’s first.
The Canadian government finally started requiring the gold seekers to bring one ton of supplies with them.

definition.zh_def: 加拿大的；與加拿大有關的
definition.en_def: Relating to Canada or its people.
definition.example: She is a Canadian citizen living in Toronto.
